title: Burn of Arizona's Largest-Ever Wildfire
description:
The Wallow fire is the largest fire ever to occur in Arizona. Started on May 29, 2011, the wildfire has consumed more than 527,000 acres (820 square miles) but has destroyed less than 40 structures.
More info on NASA.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
